text:
This list is based on a univariate time series forecasting problem, but you can adapt it for
the speciﬁcs of your problem, e.g. use VAR/VARMA/etc. in the case of multivariate time
series forecasting. Slot in more of your favorite classical time series forecasting methods and
machine learning methods as you see ﬁt. Order here is important and is structured in increasing
complexity from classical to modern methods. Early approaches are simple and give good results
